TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SingleType extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class has been deprecated as of Visual Basic 2005.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class provides methods for manipulating data that potentially represents a `Single` value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static float32 FromObject(object Value) cil managed

Docs.param: Required. Object to convert to a value.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that corresponds to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class supports the Visual Basic compiler and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public static float FromObject (object Value, System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo NumberFormat);
.method public static float32 FromObject(object Value, class System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo NumberFormat) cil managed

Docs.param: Required. Object to convert to a value.
A <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that defines how numeric values are formatted and displayed, depending on the culture.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that corresponds to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class supports the Visual Basic compiler and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
